data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! Robert Glatzel gives Cardiff a 1-0 lead in Cardiff.
In the minute 21, Birmingham's Jon Toral has been booked in Cardiff.
Leandro Bacuna (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marc Roberts grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 43, Sheyi Ojo (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from Michael Salisbury.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 53, Maxime Colin is booked for the away team.
Birmingham take a 1-2 lead thanks to Ivan Sanchez.
Birmingham make their first substitution with Alen Halilovic replacing Jonathan Leko.
In the minute 61, Jeremie Bela is on a sub for Jon Toral for Birmingham.
Mark Harris is replacing Gavin Whyte for the home team.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Cardiff.
In the minute 77, Harry Wilson levels the score at 2-2.
Cardiff's Sean Morrison scores with his head to give his side a 3-2 lead.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-2.
The home team replace Robert Glatzel with Souleymane Bamba.
